00035 class POMCategory extends POMAnnotation {
00042         public function POMCategory($text)
00043         {
00044 //              $this->nodeText = $text;
00045                 $this->name = 'Category';
00046                 $this->value = $this->parseValue($text);
00047                 $this->representation = '';
00048 
00049                 $this->children = null; // forcefully ignore children
00050 
00051                 $this->id = "category".POMElement::$elementCounter;
00052                 POMElement::$elementCounter++;
00053         }

00061         public static function createCategory($value)
00062         {
00063                 $__nodeText = '[['.'Category'.':'.$value.']]';
00064                 return new POMCategory($__nodeText);
00065         }

00067         private function parseValue ($text){
00068                 if(strpos($text, '|')){
00069                         $__start = strpos($text, ':')+1;
00070                         $__end = strpos($text, '|');
00071                         return substr($text, $__start , $__end - $__start);
00072                 }else{
00073                         $__start = strpos($text, ':')+1;
00074                         $__end = strpos($text, ']]');
00075                         return substr($text, $__start , $__end - $__start);
00076                 }
00077         }

00117 class POMProperty extends POMAnnotation {
00124         public function POMProperty($text)
00125         {
00126 //              $this->nodeText = $text;
00127                 $this->name = $this->parseName($text);
00128                 $this->value = $this->parseValue($text);
00129                 $this->representation = $this->parseRepresentation($text);
00130

00132 
00133                 $this->id = "property".POMElement::$elementCounter;
00134                 POMElement::$elementCounter++;

00145         public static function createProperty($name, $value, $representation = NULL)
00146         {
00147                 if($representation !== NULL){
00148                         $__nodeText = '[['.$name.'::'.$value.'|'.$representation.']]';
00149                 }else{
00150                         $__nodeText = '[['.$name.'::'.$value.']]';
00151                 }
00152 
00153                 return new POMProperty($__nodeText);
00154         }

00161         public function toString()
00162         {       
00163                 $__stringValue = '';
00164                 if ( strcmp($this->representation, '') === 0){
00165                         $__stringValue = '[['.$this->name.'::'.$this->value.']]';
00166                 }else{
00167                         $__stringValue = '[['.$this->name.'::'.$this->value.'|'.$this->representation.']]';
00168                 }
00169                 return $__stringValue;
00170         }

00172         private function parseName ($text){             
00173                 while(preg_match('/^\[\[/',$text) !== 0){
00174                         $__start = strpos($text, '[[')+2;
00175                         $text = substr($text, $__start);                        
00176                 }
00177                 return substr($text, 0, strpos($text, '::'));
00178         }
00179 
00180         private function parseValue ($text){
00181                 if(strpos($text, '|')){
00182                         $__start = strpos($text, '::')+2;
00183                         $__end = strpos($text, '|');
00184                         return substr($text, $__start , $__end - $__start);
00185                 }else{
00186                         $__start = strpos($text, '::')+2;
00187                         $__end = strpos($text, ']]');
00188                         return substr($text, $__start , $__end - $__start);
00189                 }
00190         }
00191 
00192         private function parseRepresentation ($text){
00193                 if(strpos($text, '|')){
00194                         $__start = strpos($text, '|')+1;
00195                         $__end = strpos($text, ']]');
00196                         return substr($text, $__start , $__end - $__start);
00197                 }else{
00198                         return '';
00199                 }
00200         }
